system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Mace)} or @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.02gA5fFJOdsPh4LS]{Archaic Weapon Proficiency (Pick)}

Benefits

When wielding a light mace, flail, heavy mace, kama, light pick, or heavy pick, the character receives +1 damage die of bludgeoning damage.
